attributes.additional_details:
They deserve the right to be protected as they carry members of the public around not knowing of the risks they could be put in!
I'd like to see our public transport workers supported in this and given the protection they so rightly deserve!
attributes.background:
Bus drivers are the unsung heroes, they have provided a service throughout the ongoing pandemic, working long hours and taking a huge risk as they do so! 
Some have lost their life's!!!

 I'd like parliament to discuss allowing bus drivers to have the right to have the covid vaccination.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564819
